<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Unit-3.5">Unit 3.5<a class="anchor-link" href="#Unit-3.5"> </a></h2><ul>
<li>Boolean: used to represent logical propositions, either true or false<ul>
<li>For example: there are clouds in the sky = True</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Relational operators<ul>
<li>For example: age to get drivers license &gt; 16</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Logical Operators<ul>
<li>not: displays the opposite of whatever the data is\</li>
<li>and: used to evaluate two conditions together</li>
<li>or: if one condition is met</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
<span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="ow">not</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sad</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>True
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pass_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
<span class="n">age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">18</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">pass_test</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">age</span> <span class="o">&gt;=</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Congrats, you get your drivers license!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>

    <div class="input_area">

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">score</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">9</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">score</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You did very well on the quiz!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<ul>
<li>Conditionals: allow for the expression of algorithms that utilize selection without a programming language</li>
<li>algorithm: the algorithm describes the instructions to complete a task, which done by the graphic with a list of instructions to do</li>
<li>Selection: Code that will execute depending on the algorithm condition returning true or false</li>
<li>Conditional Statement / If-Statement: Code that is initiated if a statement is true</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;hello&quot;</span>
<span class="n">vowel_count</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">word</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;a&quot;</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;e&quot;</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;i&quot;</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;o&quot;</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">letter</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;u&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">vowel_count</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">&quot;The number of vowels is </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">vowel_count</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">.&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>The number of vowels is 2
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">likes_count</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;no one likes this&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; liked this&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; and &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; liked this&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot;, &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; and &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; liked this&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot;, &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; and 2 others liked this&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">list1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;Grace&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Claire&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Annika&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">list2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;Grace&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Claire&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Annika&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;John&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">likes_count</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">likes_count</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_area">

Grace, Claire and 2 others liked this
</pre>

<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">weather_sunny</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
<span class="n">weather_rainy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
<span class="n">weather_cold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
<span class="n">weather_hot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">weather_sunny</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;wear sunscreen&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">weather_rainy</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Bring an umbrella&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">weather_cold</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Wear a sweater&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">weather_hot</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Wear a tank top&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Wear short sleeves&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>wear sunscreen
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Do you like experiments or numbers&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;numbers&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You should take math&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;do you like living things?&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;yes&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Take biology&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;take physics or chemistry&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Do you like learning about dead people or writng?&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;writing&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You should take english&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You should take history&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;What is your favorite album?&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;folklore&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Samzies&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Ok, understandable&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Do you like Kanye West?&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;yes&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;We can never be friends&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Good, you should listen to TS&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You should take calculus, biology, chemistry, or physics&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;You should take APEC, APUSH, or AP Government&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
